description.message: 适用于 Google 邮箱（Gmail）的通知程序，支持多组标签或账户等功能。

bg_check_new_emails.message: 正在查收新邮件，请稍候...

pp_mark_all_as_read.message: 标记本次查询中的所有邮件为已读

pp_mark_as_read_title.message: 标为已读（Shift + I 键）或标为未读（Shift + U 键）

pp_search.message: Type a query and hit the Enter key (e.g. is:unread label:inbox)

pp_notification.message: Add or remove notification for the current query and remember this query when the interface is open. Each email address needs to have at least one active notification query, or the default query is used. To ignore an email address from getting notification alerts, use the ignore list from the options page. To prevent a query from contributing to the badge counter, prepend it with the "[silent]" keyword (Shift + KeyA).

pp_previous.message: 移动到上一邮件（J 键）

pp_next.message: 移动到下一邮件（K 键）

pp_account_selector.message: 选择上一个账户（Shift + J 键）和选择下一个账户（Shift + K 键）

pp_query_selector.message: 选择上一个查询（Meta + J 键）和选择下一个查询（Meta + K 键）

pp_no_user.message: {EMAIL} 账户未登录或者访问受限。

pp_view.message: 切换单/四网格视图（Meta + V 键）

op_default_page_desc.message: 没有未读邮件时点击按钮打开此页面

op_default_engine.message: 获取电子邮件的默认引擎

op_ignored_users_desc.message: Comma-separated list of logged-in email addresses to ignore when updating badge. Instead to ignore a query prepend the query with the "[silent]" keyword.

op_mark_as_read_desc.message: 查阅时自动标记邮件为已读

op_csp_desc.message: Use this content security policy for viewing emails. For instance to prevent the viewer from loading any remote resources use "default-src 'none'; style-src 'unsafe-inline';" (without quotes), or to allow all the remote resources, empty the box

op_notification_sound.message: Whether to play a sound notification when you got a new email or not

op_notification_desktop.message: Whether to show a desktop notification when you got a new email or not

op_notification_source_title.message: A number that represents the sound's source. Use 0, 1, 2, or 3 for the default sounds

op_msg_large_file.message: This file is to big! Please reduce the filesize and retry.

op_msg_sound_id.message: 使用 '%%' 作为此声音的来源 ID
